title: Svartlebee's Woundseeker
content:
up, and then clean up the crime scene. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 130

Svartlebee's Woundseeker

Deepen the Wound: The wielder gains a +1d4 bonus to Attack Rolls with this weapon when attacking creatures that have already taken damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Wielded by Svartlebee The Custodian, so named because he had the following reputation: Have you got someone in your life causing a mess? Send Suartlebee a missive. He shall clean them up, and then
